title: Well I have a new permaban
body: Kassadin. Oh no not because I hate playing against but more so because he is my Yasuo in that I don't want him.  I'm gonna go to RANT to vent after this but yeah it's gonna look like Season I wanna say 3 or 4 Kassadin around me. But yeah he's my least favorite champion to be with in the game and wanted people to know.
